snippet: The company said that two security firms had found evidence of a breach at Michaels, a crafts retailer, and at a subsidiary, Aaron Brothers, a framing company.
abstract: Arts and crafts retailer Michaels Stores estimates that data on three million of its customers' payment cards may have been stolen in breach over several months; company says two security firms had found evidence of breach at Michaels, and at framing company subsidiary, Aaron Brothers.
lead_paragraph: The company said that two security firms had found evidence of a breach at Michaels, a crafts retailer, and at a subsidiary, Aaron Brothers, a framing company.

headline.main: Michaels Stores’ Breach Involved 3 Million Customers
headline.print_headline: Michaels Stores’ Breach Involved 3 Million Customers
